title: Breaking Barriers Hackathon (AWS × Deloitte × AT&T)
League of Legends Match Analysis (DSC80)
description:
Wrangled 100K+ matches, engineered tidy features, and compared logistic regression
          (baseline + engineered) versus random forests with cross-validation to report insights
          for gameplay strategy.

title: KataGo × LLM Project
description:
Initiated and led a pipeline from raw SGF → JSONL and a JSONL → KataGo-18B analysis step
          (top-k moves & win-rates) for filtering and reward signal; co-authored training scripts to
          fine-tune Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct via GRPO + LoRA.

title: PCA for Galaxy Spectra (Keck)
description:
Preprocessed and applied PCA + regression to 2,323 galaxy spectra to derive proxies for
          star-formation and ionization states; produced statistical analysis write-ups with R visualizations.
